Notes.Text:
This update for openldap2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-12243: Fixed a denial of service related to recursive filters (bsc#1170771).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution for Non-Commercial usage (CC-BY-NC-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Vulnerabilities.Description: In filter.c in slapd in OpenLDAP before 2.4.50, LDAP search filters with nested boolean expressions can result in denial of service (daemon crash).
